description: Prepare for your day with the most immersive weather experience ever designed. Weather for Windows 8 turns the daily forecast into a visual masterpiece. Combining high-resolution imagery with hyper-local data, this app utilizes the signature panoramic Metro interface to put the information you care about most front and center. Whether you are checking for a morning commute or planning a trip across the globe, Weather provides a comprehensive, at-a-glance look at the elements.
